Sentencas: This work analyzes different models to describe internal methane reforming in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: On the effect of methane internal reforming modelling in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Two approaches have been generally used for it: equilibrium and kinetics.
Titulo: On the effect of methane internal reforming modelling in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In the first case-equilibrium-methane reforming is considered to be fast enough to reach equilibrium.
Titulo: On the effect of methane internal reforming modelling in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Contrarily, kinetics-based theories assume that the reforming reaction is very slow and does not reach equilibrium.
Titulo: On the effect of methane internal reforming modelling in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: in this case, a reforming rate equation is needed.
Titulo: On the effect of methane internal reforming modelling in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Four cases are considered: one equilibrium model, two kinetics models and a mixed model.
Titulo: On the effect of methane internal reforming modelling in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Results show that methane reforming does not follow a unique pattern along the anodic duct and a local detailed analysis is demanded.
Titulo: On the effect of methane internal reforming modelling in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, a mixed model must be used for multidimensional SOFC modelling, although equilibrium is globally satisfactory and, therefore, it is appropriate for 0-D models.
Titulo: On the effect of methane internal reforming modelling in solid oxide fuel cells
